text: New York's 22nd congressional district is a congressional district for the United States House of Representatives currently represented by Democratic John Mannion. The district covers Syracuse and Utica; with the newest district boundaries approved by the New York State Legislature, the district also includes Auburn."New congressional maps approved in New York," Politico, February 28, 2024. Accessed: July 4, 2024. ==References== 22
title: New York's 22nd congressional district
